text: <@U88813859> GeoDataFrames looks great, but I'm having issues with plotting after a reprojection. It might be my problem, since I'm learning about these things as I play with some data I have. I'll keep playing some more.

elements.text: GeoDataFrames looks great, but I'm having issues with plotting after a reprojection. It might be my problem, since I'm learning about these things as I play with some data I have. I'll keep playing some more.

text: Feel free to make an issue on the repo if you can't get it to work. Plotting is purely from ArchGDAL, so it does need a geometry like that.
